title: Complete 520 set t206 low grade $49,500 SOLD!!
author: Mattcards1955

posts.post_title: Complete 520 set t206 low grade $49,500 SOLD!!
posts.post_content:
Guys,

After much thought I have decided to part with my entire set. I'm going to price them reasonably as this is a low grade set. Most cards are between 2-3 with a couple higher grades in the mix. 

I'll be posting pictures here shortly. I have come to terms with the fact this is not as nice of a set as i thought it was and am lowering my asking price for set to $49,500. I will entertain offers so price is not set in stone. Most cards are raw. The major stars like cobb are in tough shape but are graded. Both batt on shoulder and off shoulder cobbs have now been sold

Thanks for looking. Send me a PM here if you are interested. Final price drop before sending to auction.
Very cool, wish I had the funds! Best of luck.
Thanks for the kind words. Much appreciated
Kudos to you! Great accomplishment! I love finishing sets...and this is one I'll unfortunately never finish
Great set!  Good luck with the sale!  I will vouch for the seller!
Awesome job completing the set and best of luck with the sale!
Good luck with this sale and congratulations!

Thanks guys! I may entertain offers and maybe a partial trade. Obviously money would better.

For those of you messaging about individual cards feel free to make an offer in case the set doesn’t sell but at this time I’m more interested in selling set as a whole.

Happy Monday..

Price has been lowered to $58k. I'm taking best offers on the set.

Thanks!
Privet lowered to $49,500. Its the final drop before sending to auction.
Set is now Sold! Thanks for everyone’s interest
